title: Vanguard of the Eternal Night - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen   Shounen Ai   Sports   Yaoi
tags: Adventurers   Angels   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Assassins   Battle Competition   Bookworm   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Clubs   Confident Protagonist   e-Sports   Early Romance   Elves   Famous Protagonist   Fantasy World   Futuristic Setting   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Genius Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Incubus   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Technology   Manly Gay Couple   Marriage   Multiple POV   Multiple Realms   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Seme Protagonist   Skill Creation   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Wealthy Characters   World Travel
author: The Aria At The Fingertips   Zhǐ jiān de yǒngtàndiào   指尖的咏叹调
description:
A master assassin transmigrates into an interstellar era.
  
Other players were responsible for competing in the e-sports arena, while he was responsible for stringing up and beating up the other players.

His sword was hidden during the peak of day, and he was a gentleman who arrived in a flash of light;
 As a vanguard of the eternal night, he was the variable between life and death in the world.
 
'As you know, the Star League’s difficulty levels are arranged in this way:
Paradise < Simple < Normal < Difficult < Nightmare < Hell < [Tyron Odin]”>
